categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Paul Kasey (born August 5, 1973) is an English actor who plays Admiral Raddus in the 2016 anthology film, Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. He also portrayed the pilots Ello Asty and C'ai Threnalli in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, two Abednedos created by using one of Neal Scanlan's animatronic masks, but their voices were provided by sound designer Matthew Wood. He portrayed Threnalli again in Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi.
Ue also taught the local Jordanians the Aki-Aki choreography for the Festival of the Ancestors scene.
